message.name: ERR_FV_PERCENTAGE_VALUE
message.locale: Percentage value should not be less than 0 and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: Investigation resolution approval check is already canceled.
Investigation resolution approval check is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: This investigation resolution approval check is already active. Please modify the existing record.

message.name: ERR_RV_NO_MODIFY_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: Investigation resolution approval check cannot be modified as it is canceled.
Investigation resolution approval check cannot be modified as it is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SELECT_INVESTIGATION
message.locale: Investigation must be specified if Applies to All Investigations has not been selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SELECT_ALLINVESTIGATIONSIND
message.locale: Investigation must not be specified if Applies to All Investigations has been selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_INVESTIGATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: This investigation has already been canceled. An investigation resolution approval check cannot be created for a canceled investigation.
This investigation has already been cancelled. An investigation resolution approval check cannot be created for a cancelled investigation.

message.name: ERR_XRV_MODIFY_INVESTIGATION_CANCELLED
message.locale: This investigation has already been canceled. An investigation resolution approval check cannot be modified for a canceled investigation.
This investigation has already been cancelled. An investigation resolution approval check cannot be modified for a cancelled investigation.
